context.name: FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Paddle Holster
context.excerpt: The FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Paddle Holster has been developed for a special LE agency that required a slim fitting design that would enable an easy draw of the handgun from a standing and sitting position.
context.content:
The FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Paddle Holster was initially developed for a special LE agency that required a slim fitting design that would enable an easy draw of the handgun from a standing and sitting position.

The ScorpusÂ® Level 1 Retention System features two separate, opposing, passive retention devices that capture the trigger guard of the handgun and are pressure activated. To draw the handgun, the operator must firmly hold the grip and then perform a clean draw.
